product_name: Kurgo Portsmouth Dog Rain Jacket - X-Small - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Go on, take a hike with your 4-legged friend even on damp, drizzly days. This X-Small water-resistant jacket keeps your pooch comfortable, while the vintage color combo brightens a cloudy day.
short_description: Go on, take a hike with your 4-legged friend even on damp, drizzly days. This X-Small water-resistant jacket keeps your pooch comfortable, while the vintage color combo brightens a cloudy day.
